price: Sε wͻyε wͻn adwen sε wͻ’begyae awadeε nso a, nokorε sε, Nyankopͻn te biribiara, Ɔne Onimdefoͻ.
arabic: وَإِنۡ عَزَمُواْ ٱلطَّلَٰقَ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-in ʿazamū al-ṭalāqa fa-inna al-laha samīʿun ʿalīmun
